string-array.name: list_faq_question
string-array.item: Who is Sosokan?
How do I signup for Sosokan?
Is Sosokan Free?
How do I post on Sosokan?
How can I advertise on Sosokan?
Will Sosokan publish my personal information?
How does Sosokan Subscription works?
How secure is Sosokan?
Will Sosokan be launch in another language?
How can I delete a post on Sosokan?
How do Sosokan process payment between buyer and seller, or customer and merchant?
How do I report illegal activity on Sosokan?
How do I edit my user profile on Sosokan?
Who can I invite to Sosokan?
How can I share an ad on Sosokan?
How do I delete my account on Sosokan?
How do I delete messages on Sosokan?
Where do I enter password on Sosokan?
Where can I see all my postings?
Is Sosokan supported on Android?
How can I move my listing to the Top?
Can I add attachment within Chat on Sosokan?
Can I post on Sosokanapp.com?
I do not see the category I want on Sosokan?

string-array.name: list_faq_answer
string-array.item: Sosokan is a classifieds app created by a group of to provide a user friendly experience for searching local advertisement and classifieds. While many are frustrated and overwhelmed by the complexity of Craigslists and many other online classifieds, Sosokan is here to make it simple for all in the palm of your hand.

We have took the initiative to make the signup process as simple as 1-2-3. All you need is a valid phone number, facebook or a wechat account. For phone number verification, after you click on signup, enter your phone number and verify it with the sms text code sent to your phone. Viola! For Facebook and weChat, all you need is to login via your facebook userid and password and authenticate sosokan.

Yes, Sosokan is free for all users to browse and post ads with picture without any fee. However, if you want your ads to stand out amongst others, you can use our premium version which allows you to post videos and customized description page for a small fee. Please contact us at info@sosokanapp.com for Premium ads.

We have made posting simple with a click of a button. Where ever you see a big, yellow "+ " button within our app, you can click on that to add a new post. Then all you need to do is fill-in a brief/detail description.
If you are interested in marketing your company within our apps, please contact our sales team at info@sosokanapp.com.
Unless you specified in the ads, the only information Sosokan will publish on the ad is your phone number and email address, which is also enabled by you on posting of an ad.

Just clicked on the category/sub-category that you are interested in receiving the most updated information, each time a new ad or classified is posted, you will receive a notification. It eliminates the hassle of continuing to search for a specific item repeatedly.

Although Sosokan is a free app and free to browse, we do require our posting to allowed only to registered users. This will provide a sense of security to our contents and eliminate spams. Our team will monitor all posts and filter out illegal and unauthorized contents that are hazard to our app and to national security.

Yes, Sosokan is currently being launched in two languages, English and Chinese. Our future releases will have the support of multiple languages such as Spanish, German, French, Italian, Russian and many more.
All you need to do is to mark the specific post expired in your "My Posts " menu option.

Sosokan does not process any forms of payment between buyer and seller, or customer and merchant. All transactions are processed via payment method arranged between buyer and seller, or customer and merchant.
Within each ad, please click on the "REPORT IT" and our team will investigate the issue. If it was found to be offensive and illegal, we will remove the ad immediately.
In the menu, setting page, you can click on "Edit Profile " button to update your information.
If you find Sosokan is useful and would like to share our app to your friends, you can invite them via Facebook, Twitter, and weChat contact.
Click on the share icon on the upper right picture of each ad and you can share on your favorite apps.

Why would you want to do that? Please email us at info@sosokanapp.com and we will remove your account. But to help us improve our app for other users, please feel free to drop us a line when you send us the email. We do take your opinion and suggestion in a serious manner.
In main menu, click on "Messages ", then slide right-to-left on the specific chat to delete unwanted messages.
Sosokan does not require password since users are phone, Facebook and weChat verified. Currently we do not have the option for password changes.
In main menu, click on "My Posts ", and you will be able to see all of your postings to date. Is Sosokan supported on Android?
Our first launch of the Sosokan app is on IOS only. Our team of developer are working on the Android version tirelessly and hope to launch the Android version in the coming months.

Listings are sorted by time and date. We do not recommend posting the same advertisement repeatedly just to be on the Top, as long as your ads are relevant, our user will be able to see it with a simple search. It is actually against our policy to post the same ad within a 7 days period. Repeat offenders will have their listings revoked and their account suspended.
Our programmers are working on this feature. Currently it is not supported.
You can only browse on Sosokanapp.com. Posting are only available on our Sosokan app
Great! As we are continuing to improve our app, you have found our missing link. We want you to email us the category that we are missing and we will gladly add it if appropriate.
